price: Njemu je On vlast nad njima sedam noći i osam dana uzastopnih bio prepustio, pa si u njima ljude povaljane kao šuplja palmina debla vidio,
arabic: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَبۡعَ لَيَالٖ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومٗاۖ فَتَرَى ٱلۡقَوۡمَ فِيهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِيَةٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: sakharahā ʿalayhim sabʿa layālin wathamāniyata ayyāmin ḥusūman fatarā al-qawma fīhā ṣarʿā ka-annahum aʿjāzu nakhlin khāwiyatin
